name: Handy Taxi
tagline: Designed for everyone, even if you have a wheelchair
body:
### Not like the other taxis services
Our app is designed to be used by people with physical disabilities if they want it. It will be easy for them to order like anyone a taxi by specifying if they need a special car (for the wheelchair) or not

### The bridge between users and taxis/chauffeurs services
Released as a mobile app and as a phone line you will be able to order a taxi even if you don't have a smartphone.
We're making the connection between you and the taxi service you'd like to use (Easytaxi, Uber, etc.)

### Our little plus
When you order a car without being disabled people, you can at the end of your order, decide how you split up the fare between, Handy-Taxi, taxi/chauffeur service and our donation feature. If you decide to put money in the donation feature, each time someone with a physical disability use our app to travel, his fare will be lower.

### Authors and Contributors
Jose Luis Toledo Medina
Ricardo Patricio Gutierrez Garcia
Carlos Eduardo Villalobos Castro
Ana Paula Vega Neuenschwander
Diego Juan Medjdoub

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
